repairedDockerfile:
FROM tensorflow/tensorflow:1.4.1-gpu

LABEL maintainer="Cris Valenzuela <cv965@nyu.edu>"

RUN apt-get update
RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends wget -y && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y software-properties-common && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# Install "ffmpeg"
RUN add-apt-repository ppa:mc3man/xerus-media
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y ffmpeg && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# Copy all files in directory
COPY . /styletransfer
# COPY requirements.txt /styletransfer

WORKDIR "/styletransfer"

# Install dependencies
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r requirements.txt

RUN mkdir /styletransfer/data
WORKDIR "/styletransfer/data"
RUN wget https://www.vlfeat.org/matconvnet/models/beta16/imagenet-vgg-verydeep-19.mat
RUN wget https://images.cocodataset.org/zips/train2014.zip
RUN unzip train2014.zip

WORKDIR "/styletransfer"
